description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a LightningJS component named 'NoteEditor' for a note-taking application's frontend. It manages the structure, state, and behavior of the note editing interface, including rendering elements, handling state updates, subscribing to external data sources, and defining input interactions.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, including rendering UI elements for title, content, and controls, as well as managing state, subscriptions, and user interactions.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Queues an auto-save operation with a debounce of 600ms to prevent excessive saves during rapid editing.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note by invoking the external 'updateNote' service, handles visual 'saving' indicator, and simulates a delay to mimic asynchronous behavior.
